channel.title: CVE Feed for Heateor -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Heateor -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4971|2024-10-16T18:04:03.516Z -- heateor -- social%20sharing%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20sassy%20social%20share
item.description: The Sassy Social Share plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'urls' parameter called via the 'heateor_sss_sharing_count' AJAX action in versions up to, and including, 3.3.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-32674|2024-08-02T02:13:40.480Z -- heateor -- heateor%20social%20login%20wordpress
item.description: Heateor Social Login WordPress prior to 1.1.32 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who accessed the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-32674|2024-06-06T17:32:57.758Z -- heateor -- heateor%20social%20login%20wordpress
item.description: Heateor Social Login WordPress prior to 1.1.32 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who accessed the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2022-4971|2024-10-16T06:43:35.013Z -- heateor -- social%20sharing%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20sassy%20social%20share
item.description: The Sassy Social Share plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'urls' parameter called via the 'heateor_sss_sharing_count' AJAX action in versions up to, and including, 3.3.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
